results.title: Do detectives think?
results.creator_credit: Fred Guiol, Hal Roach, Hal Roach Studios and Pathé Frères
results.brief_description: An escaped convict (Young) is out to kill the judge (Finlayson) who sentenced him. Two inept detectives (Laurel & Hardy) are hired to guard the judge.

results.title: Dizzy acrobat
results.creator_credit: Walter Lantz, Castle Films and United World Films

results.title: Divorce = Li Hun [NTSC]
results.creator_credit: Wang Haowei and Beijing Film Studio
results.brief_description: Set in Beijing in the early thirties, “Li Hun” recounts the cultural conficts faced by a well-natured match-maker caught between Chinese tradition and the Western ideas of marriage and family that are beginning to take hold amongst his friends. Adapted from the original work by the famous drama writer Lao She. In Mandarin with English subtitles.

results.title: Diverse visions: twelve Australian mid to late career artists
results.brief_description: Artists included are: Charles Blackman, Mike Brown, Ray Crooke, Rosalie Gascoigne, Inge King, Robert Klippel, Les Kossatz, Alun Leach-Jones, John Perceval, Gareth Sansom, Gordon Sheperdson, John Wolseley. Eight of the artists speak about their work on location at an exhibition. Catalogue essay writers speak about the work of the artists unable to appear. The documentary was devised by John Massy.

results.description: Artists included are: Charles Blackman, Mike Brown, Ray Crooke, Rosalie Gascoigne, Inge King, Robert Klippel, Les Kossatz, Alun Leach-Jones, John Perceval, Gareth Sansom, Gordon Sheperdson, John Wolseley. Eight of the artists speak about their work on location at an exhibition. Catalogue essay writers speak about the work of the artists unable to appear. The documentary was devised by John Massy.

results.title: Diver's logbook: the reef at Heron Island
results.brief_description: Underwater photography of the varied marine life of a coral reef, showing living corals and plants, sea anemones, sea cucumbers and a number of species of fish.

results.title: Distribution of foods
results.brief_description: Studies the technological advances made in the methods of preserving and transporting foodstuffs, showing their relation to the distribution of perishable foods on a world scale, the flow of foods from producer to consumer, the problems which a limited family income raises, and the international trade and tariff barriers.

results.title: Distillation
results.creator_credit: Peter Baylis, Sir Arthur Hallam Elton and Shell Film Unit
results.brief_description: An explanation of the fundamentals of distillation illustrates by examples of methods used in the fractional distillation of crude oil. Studies the following: size of atoms; structure of the hydrocarbon molecules; crude oil mixture of different compounds which are separated for commercial use into petrol and lubricating oils; fractional distillation of mixtures of hydro-carbons by laboratory and industrial processes.
